subject: Soccer
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: As an assistant and eventual successor to Pep Guardiola, Mr. Vilanova helped turn Barcelona into one of the world’s best teams, with triumphs that included two Champions League titles.
snippet: As an assistant and eventual successor to Pep Guardiola, Mr. Vilanova helped turn Barcelona into one of the world’s best teams, with triumphs that included two Champions League titles.
